title: Chicago (Indian) man arrested for allegedly scamming older victims to pay gold bars to rid of warrants
comments: News says that 'a Chicago man' was arrested ?

Ladies and Gentelmen, I present you the "Chicago Man", **Tejaskumar Patel**
